summary: This module defines a collection of helper functions that generate Redux‑style actions for the UI layer of the fapolicy analyzer. Each function creates a typed action with an appropriate payload for events such as data loading, error reporting, profiling control, system deployment, checkpoint handling, and user notifications.
business_intent: Provide a clear, centralized way for UI components to dispatch state‑changing actions related to policy analysis, profiling, and system management, enabling consistent state updates and error handling throughout the application.
